about.title: SquareGPS Test Assignment
about.intro: You need to build an application using Vue.js, Vuex, VueRouter, and Vuetify. The app header must contain a menu with two items: About and Map.

sectionAbout.title: “About” section
sectionAbout.text: This section should contain the text of this assignment, laid out similarly.

sectionMap.title: “Map” section
sectionMap.text: The screen should display a map and a list:

list.addMode: When clicking the add button, the map should switch to marker add mode...
list.highlightOnMarkerClick: Clicking a marker should highlight the corresponding list item.
list.centerOnListClick: Clicking a list item should center the map on the marker.
list.persistMarkers: Markers must be stored locally and persist after page reload.
list.showIdInUrl: The URL should display the id of the selected marker.

extra.title: Additionally
extra.test: Write one unit test with Jest.

reminder.text: The test assignment is meant to demonstrate the ability to write good modular code and to work with the listed technologies and more. You should be proud of this code.
